name: Physics Ball Games -Bricks3D
description:
Shoot a ball to touch screen.
Fall all white blocks.
Enjoy physics puzzles.


how to play
・It is clear if I fail all the white blocks on the stage.
・Tap screen and shoot a ball, and let's fall a block.
・You can move viewpoint to swipe screen.

characteristic
・You can play simply and easily.
・I prepared various stages.
・Everyone can enjoy it from a child to an adult.

This is recommended for such a person
・The person who wants to do time killing.
・The person who wants to do a physics puzzles.


Font
